name: 스플: 선택형 스토리
description:
Your choice can change the endings
in this interactive game platform, Storyplay!

■ Main character VS sub character, love VS friendship, revenge VS forgiveness ■


Have you ever imagined what would have happened if you made a different choice? in the past?
In storyplay, you can be the actual main character and lead the story by making choices.
You can also decide who to be the main or the sub character.


■ Storyplay Original Stories ■

You can play various original stories made by Storyplay team
such as "16 MBTIs on Blind Date", or "Love Game".
"I was bullied by K-pop idol", "P.H.O.B.I.A" and many others.



■ Make Your Own Ending Collection ■

You can enjoy the interactive story as if your chatting with your friends.
The storyline will change based on your choices.
Your choices will lead to various different endings!
Try to find some rare endings that are super hard to find!



■ Stories will be updated every week ■

Storyplay Original Stories will be updated every week.
Also, stay tuned for the upcoming new stories!


---
■ PLEASE NOTE: About user information access

We would like to let you know about the information that users should submit to storyplay to use the application:
- (optional) notification: You should turn on the notification to get updated information(contents, advertisement, events, and more) from storyplay.


■ PLEASE NOTE: About subscription

If you want to use the subscription service, you should make sure that your payment method is updated safely.
Thorugh the registered payment method, the subscription fee will be regularly paid and the subscription period will be automatically renewed.
If you cancel the subscription, you can still use the subscription service for the remaining period until next payment.
